DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether statin effective treatment vasospastic angina .
DOC.brief_title: Statin Therapy In Patients With Vasospastic Angina
DOC.criteria: Age 19 Vasospastic angina LDL le 160mg/dl Written consent Coronary artery stenosis 50 % ischemic coronary disease History percutaneous coronary intervention Cerebrovascular diseases peripheral Dyslipidemia require statin therapy Heart failure , arrhythmogenic right ventricular dysplasia , hypertrophic cardiomyopathy , akinesia aneurysm leave ventricular wall , anomaly coronary artery NYHA III IV Arrhythmia Primary cardiac electrical disease Cardiac pacemaker implantable defibrillator Pregnancy breast feed Life expectancy le 2 year
